message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value related to the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life - which is depreciation.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a line item labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45745.79. This represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives for the period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45745.79'} }
```
